newsitem.title: USA: Edison Intl 790 MW Mohave unit seen up Wed.
newsitem.headline: Edison Intl 790 MW Mohave unit seen up Wed.

text.p: The 790 megawatt (MW) unit 1 at the Mohave coal-fired power plant is in start-up mode and should begin performance testing on Wednesday, sources familiar with the plant's operations said Monday.
The unit, located near Laughlin, Nevada, was shut Friday night for work on its precipitor controls, they said.
The Mohave plant's other 790 MW unit is said to be operating at normal rates.
The Mohave plant is majority owned and operated by Edison International's Southern California Edison Co.
